title: Alpha Crescendo
highlight: Unleashing creativity, one note at a time.
description: A vibrant cultural night where talents shine and music takes center stage. Alpha Crescendo brings together performers from every corner of the campus to celebrate art, rhythm, and passion in an unforgettable evening.

title: Farewell Party
highlight: Bidding goodbye with laughter, memories, and style.
description: A heartfelt evening to celebrate the journey of our graduating batch. With speeches, performances, and a trip down memory lane, the Farewell Party is our way of saying thank you and good luck for the road ahead.

title: Freshers Party
highlight: Welcoming new faces with energy and excitement.
description: The Freshers Party is your grand entry into campus life! A night full of fun, music, and ice-breaking activities designed to help new students mingle, feel at home, and kickstart their college journey in style.
